name: N7 Plays Pacman
description:
N7 Plays Pacman is a local-multiplayer game where anyone can get his/her cellphone to connect to the same network as the game host and join the party via the page http://happyfuntimes.net.

Each avatar is controlled by multiple players who vote for the next move.

The pacmans must eat the monster and the monster must escape them and collect the coins.

Special names for players who want to embody the monster :

jplayerleft : the player who wants to control the left direction of the monster

jplayerright : the player who wants to control the rightdirection of the monster

jplayerup : the player who wants to control the up direction of the monster

jplayerdown : the player who wants to control the down direction of the monster

Made with Unity by Maxime Wyzuj, using the HappyFunTimes asset.
